entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 3:26 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.5°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
